name: Return of the Golden Beacon
description: Return of the Golden Beacon is an interactive VR narrative that transports you to a fantasy setting, adrift at sea in uncharted waters. Landing on an undiscovered island, a crew of explorers had attempted to subjugate its native people. Defeated and driven off, the survivors face a reckoning. Immersed amongst the crew, your movement is on a set track; reminiscent of a theme park thrill ride. To gain more insight into the series of events that led to their current circumstances, you are able to interact with the survivors as well as objects around the ship.
